welcome_message_body: Welcome to Le Blanc-Mesnil! This charming city is known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Le Blanc-Mesnil has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Composed of seven sub-terminals, Terminal 2 is the main hub for Air France and other major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used mainly for low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster connection speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
